						"Function"      "FrostArmorParticle"	

						"particle"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_lich/lich_frost_armor.vpcf"
					}
				}	

				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"    "abilities/dota imba/hero_lich.lua"
						"Function"      "EndFrostArmorParticle"	
					}
				}	

				"StatusEffectName"		"particles/status_fx/status_effect_frost_armor.vpcf"
				"StatusEffectPriority"	"10"	

				"OnTakeDamage"
				{
					"ApplyModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_imba_frost_armor_slow"

						{
							"Center"  	"ATTACKER"
							"Teams" 	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
							"Types" 	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
						}

					}	

					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"	"Hero_Lich.FrostArmorDamage"
						"Target"		"ATTACKER"
					}
				}
			}

			{

				}
			}

	//=================================================================================================================
	// Necrolyte's Sadist

	"imba_necrolyte_sadist"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"mana_regen"		"2 4 6 12"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"health_regen"		"1 2 3 6"
			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"hero_multiplier"	"10"
			}
			"04"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"regen_duration"	"10"
			}
		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_imba_sadist"
			{
				"Passive"			"1"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsBuff"			"1"
				"IsPurgable"		"0"

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"internal/util.lua"
						"Function"			"IllusionPassiveRemover"

						"modifier"			"modifier_imba_sadist"
					}
				}

				"OnKill"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"abilities/dota imba/hero_necrolyte.lua"
						"Function"			"SadistKill"

						"regen_modifier"	"modifier_imba_sadist_regen"
					}
				}

				"OnAttackLanded"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"abilities/dota imba/hero_necrolyte.lua"
						"Function"			"SadistHit"

						"regen_modifier"	"modifier_imba_sadist_regen"
					}
				}
			}

			"modifier_imba_sadist_stack"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsBuff"			"1"
				"IsPurgable"		"0"

				"Duration"			"%regen_duration"
			}

			"modifier_imba_sadist_regen"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsBuff"			"1"
				"IsPurgable"		"0"

				"Duration"			"%regen_duration"

				"Attributes"		"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"abilities/dota imba/hero_necrolyte.lua"
						"Function"			"ApplySadist"

						"stack_modifier"	"modifier_imba_sadist_stack"
					}
				}

				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"abilities/dota imba/hero_necrolyte.lua"
						"Function"			"RemoveSadist"

						"stack_modifier"	"modifier_imba_sadist_stack"
					}
				}

				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT"		"%mana_regen"
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT"	"%health_regen"
				}
			}
		}
	}

	//=================================================================================================================
	// Shadow Fiend's Shadowraze #1
	// Author: Thor
	// Date: August 28, 2016
	// Based on a recreation of the original ability by Noya on April 5, 2015
	//=================================================================================================================
	"imba_nevermore_shadowraze1"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_BEHAVIOR_AOE"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
		"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY" 
		"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
		"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
		"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"nevermore_shadowraze1"

		// Casting
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.5"
		"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_RAZE_1"
		"AbilityCastRange"				"450"

		// Time     
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCooldown"				"10.0"

		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"90"

		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"precache"
		{
			"particle"					"particles/hero/nevermore/nevermore_shadowraze_450.vpcf"
			"soundfile"					"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_nevermore.vsndevts"
		}

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"radius"					"450"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"combo_modifier_duration"	"3"
			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"raze_damage"				"100 175 250 325"
			}
			"04"
			{
				"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"soul_damage_bonus"			"3"
			}
			"05"
			{
				"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"raze_refresh_cooldown"		"30"
			}
		}

		"OnUpgrade"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"				"abilities/dota imba/hero_nevermore.lua"
				"Function"					"ShadowrazeLeveled"

				"near_raze"					"imba_nevermore_shadowraze1"
				"medium_raze"				"imba_nevermore_shadowraze2"
				"far_raze"					"imba_nevermore_shadowraze3"
			}
		}

		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"						"abilities/dota imba/hero_nevermore.lua"
				"Function"							"Shadowraze1Cast"

				"modifier_combo"					"modifier_imba_shadowraze_combo"
				"modifier_souls_count"				"modifier_imba_necromastery_souls_dummy"
				"modifier_souls_temp"				"modifier_imba_necromastery_souls_temp"
				"modifier_raze_no_cooldown"			"modifier_imba_shadowraze_no_cooldown"
				"modifier_raze_refresh_cooldown"	"modifier_imba_shadowraze_refresh_cooldown"
				"particle_raze"						"particles/hero/nevermore/nevermore_shadowraze_450.vpcf"
				"sound_raze"						"Hero_Nevermore.Shadowraze"
				"near_raze"							"imba_nevermore_shadowraze1"
				"medium_raze"						"imba_nevermore_shadowraze2"
				"far_raze"							"imba_nevermore_shadowraze3"
				"presence_of_the_dark_lord"			"imba_nevermore_dark_lord"
				"necromastery"						"imba_nevermore_necromastery"
				"modifier_dark_lord_raze"			"modifier_imba_dark_lord_raze"
			}
		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			//Modifier applied to targets hit by shadowraze to count number of combo hits
			"modifier_imba_shadowraze_combo"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsPurgable"		"0"
				"IsBuff"			"1"

				"Attributes"		"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"

				"Duration"			"%combo_modifier_duration"
			}

			//Modifier applied to caster to stop raze from refreshing due to hitting combos
			"modifier_imba_shadowraze_refresh_cooldown"
			{
				"Duration"			"%raze_refresh_cooldown"
			}
		}
	}

		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		{
			"01"

				"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"

			{

				"IsHidden"					"1"
				"IsDebuff"					"1"
				"IsPurgable"				"1"

				"Attributes"				"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_PERMANENT"

				"Duration"					"%screen_black_duration"

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"abilities/dota imba/hero_nevermore.lua"
						"Function"			"RequiemDebuffCreated"
	
						"particle_screen"	"particles/hero/nevermore/screen_requiem_indicator.vpcf"
					}
				}

				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"abilities/dota imba/hero_nevermore.lua"
						"Function"			"RequiemDebuffDestroyed"
					}
				}
			}

			//Modifier that allows caster to cast razes without cooldown. Removed if a raze is cast without hitting a hero.
			//This functionality is built into raze rather than the modifier itself.
			"modifier_imba_shadowraze_no_cooldown"
			{
				"Passive"					"0"
				"IsHidden"					"0"
				"IsBuff"					"1"
				"IsPurgable"				"0"

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"abilities/dota imba/hero_nevermore.lua"
						"Function"			"ShadowrazeNoCooldownBuffCreated"

						"near_raze"			"imba_nevermore_shadowraze1"
						"medium_raze"		"imba_nevermore_shadowraze2"
						"far_raze"			"imba_nevermore_shadowraze3"
					}
				}
			}

			"modifier_imba_requiem_enemy_debuff"
			{
				"Passive"					"0"
				"IsHidden"					"0"
				"IsDebuff"					"1"
				"IsPurgable"				"1"

				"Duration"					"%slow_duration"

				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE"	"%reduction_ms"
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_DAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE"	"%reduction_damage"
				}
			}
		}
	}

		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3"
		
		// Time		
		//---------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCooldown"				"30.0 24.0 18.0 12.0"

		// Cost
		//---------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"115"
		
		// Special
		//---------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"damage"			"150 200 250 300"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"duration"			"4"
			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"debuff_duration"	"3 4 5 6"
			}
		}

		// Spell Actions
		//---------------------------------------------
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"	"Hero_Silencer.LastWord.Cast"
				"Target"		"TARGET"
			}	

			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"  "modifier_imba_last_word"
				"Target"		"TARGET"
			}
		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_imba_last_word"
			{
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"Duration"			"%duration"
				"ThinkInterval"		"%duration"
				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_silencer/silencer_last_word_status.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"

				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_PROVIDES_VISION"	"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"	
				}
				
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{

					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"		"Hero_Silencer.LastWord.Damage"
						"Target"			"TARGET"
					}

					"ApplyModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"		"modifier_imba_last_word_silence"
						"Target"			"TARGET"
					}

					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"abilities/dota imba/hero_silencer.lua"
						"Function"			"LastWordDamageNoCast"
						"Target"			"TARGET"

						"modifier"			"modifier_imba_last_word"
					}
				}

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"		"Hero_Silencer.LastWord.Target"
						"Target"			"TARGET"
					}
				}

				"OnSpentMana"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"abilities/dota imba/hero_silencer.lua"
						"Function"			"LastWordDamage"
						"Target"			"UNIT"

						"modifier"			"modifier_imba_last_word"
					}
				}

				"OnAbilityExecuted"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"abilities/dota imba/hero_silencer.lua"
						"Function"			"LastWordDebuff"
						"Target"			"UNIT"

						"modifier"			"modifier_imba_last_word"
						"silence_modifier"	"modifier_imba_last_word_silence"

						"sound"				"Hero_Silencer.LastWord.Target"
						"damage_sound"		"Hero_Silencer.LastWord.Damage"
					}
				}

				"OnAbilityEndChannel"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"abilities/dota imba/hero_silencer.lua"
						"Function"			"LastWordDebuff"
						"Target"			"UNIT"

						"modifier"			"modifier_imba_last_word"
						"silence_modifier"	"modifier_imba_last_word_silence"

						"sound"				"Hero_Silencer.LastWord.Target"
						"damage_sound"		"Hero_Silencer.LastWord.Damage"
					}
				}
			}

			"modifier_imba_last_word_silence"
			{

				"Duration"					"%debuff_duration"

	//=================================================================================================================
	// Silencer's Global Silence
	// (Based on Pizzalol's SpellLibrary)
	//=================================================================================================================
	"imba_silencer_global_silence"
	{
		// General
		//--------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"					"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityType"				"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
		"AbilityBehavior"			"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET"
		"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
		"AbilityUnitTargetType"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
		"AbilityUnitTargetFlags"	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
		"AbilityTextureName" 		"silencer_global_silence"
		"SpellImmunityType"			"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"

		// Casting
		//---------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastPoint"			"0.2"
		"AbilityCooldown"			"120.0 110.0 100.0"

		// Time
		//---------------------------------------------
		"AbilityDuration"			"5.0 7.0 9.0"

		// Precache
		//---------------------------------------------
		"precache"
		{
			"soundfile"				"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_silencer.vsndevts"
			"particle"				"particles/units/heroes/hero_silencer/silencer_global_silence.vpcf"
		}

		// Cost
		//--------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost" 			"250 375 500"

		// Special
		//--------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"duration"			"5.0 7.0 9.0"
			}
		}

		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			//Only applies the sound on caster, otherwise RIP headphones in 10v10
			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"		"Hero_Silencer.GlobalSilence.Cast"
				"Target"			"CASTER"
			}

			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"		"Hero_Silencer.GlobalSilence.Effect"
				"Target"			"CASTER"
			}

			"FireEffect"
			{
				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_silencer/silencer_global_silence.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
				"Target"			"CASTER"
			}

			"ActOnTargets"
			{
				"Target"
				{
					"Center"				"CASTER"
					"Radius"				"GLOBAL"
					"Teams"					"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
					"Types"					"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
					"Flags"					"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
				}

				"Action"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"abilities/dota imba/hero_silencer.lua"
						"Function"			"GlobalSilenceCast"
						"Target"			"TARGET"

						"curse_name"		"imba_silencer_arcane_curse"
						"curse_modifier"	"modifier_imba_arcane_curse_debuff"
						"silence_modifier"	"modifier_imba_global_silence"
					}
				}
			}
		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_imba_global_silence"
			{
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"IsPurgable"		"1"
				"Duration"			"%duration"

				"EffectName"		"particles/generic_gameplay/generic_silence.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_overhead"

				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_SILENCED"	"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
			}
		}

		"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"	
		"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
		"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"custom/gemini_unstable_rift"

		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		{
			"soundfile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_juggernaut.vsndevts"

		}

		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3 0.3 0.3 0.3"

				"summon_time" "%summon_time"

						{
						"ScriptFile" "abilities/dusk/gemini_abilities.lua"
						"Function" "gemini_unstable_rift_transport"
						"summon_time" "%summon_time"
						}
					}
				"OnDestroy"
					{
					"RunScript"
						{
						"ScriptFile" "abilities/dusk/gemini_abilities.lua"
						"Function" "gemini_unstable_rift_end"
						}
					}
				}
			"gemini_unstable_rift_count_mod"
				{
				"Duration" "0.5"
				"IsHidden" "1"
				"OnDestroy"
					{
					"RemoveModifier"

						"ModifierName" "gemini_unstable_rift_show_mod"

						}
					}
				}
			"gemini_unstable_rift_show_mod"
				{
				"IsBuff" "1"
				"EffectName" "particles/units/heroes/hero_chen/chen_teleport.vpcf"
				}
			}
		}

    // Rewrite of the Bloodseeker Thirst ability
    // Author: YOLOSPAGHETTI
    // Date: February 13, 2016
    // Version: 6.86
    // Type: Datadriven/Lua
    //
    // ----- FILE REQUIREMENTS -----
    // Script files:
    // scripts/vscripts/heroes/hero_bloodseeker/thirst.lua
    // scripts/vscripts/libraries/modifiers/modifier_movespeed_cap.lua
    "bloodseeker_thirst_lod" 
    {
        // General
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

        "BaseClass"                         "ability_datadriven"
        "AbilityBehavior"                   "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
        "SpellImmunityType"                 "SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
        "AbilityTextureName"                "bloodseeker_thirst"

        "precache"
        {
            "particle"                      "particles/units/heroes/hero_bloodseeker/bloodseeker_thirst_owner.vpcf"
            "particle"                      "particles/status_fx/status_effect_thirst_vision.vpcf"
            "particle"                      "particles/units/heroes/hero_bloodseeker/bloodseeker_vision.vpcf"
        }
        
        // Special
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

        "AbilitySpecial"

        {
            "01"
            {
                "var_type"                  "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "visibility_threshold_pct"  "25"
            }
            "02"
            {
                "var_type"                  "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "buff_threshold_pct"        "75"
            }
            "03"
            {
                "var_type"                  "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "bonus_movement_speed"      "16 24 32 40"
            } 
            "04"
            {
                "var_type"                  "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "bonus_damage"              "16 24 32 40"
            }
            "05"
            {
                "var_type"                  "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "bonus_movement_speed_per_stack" "0.32 0.48 0.64 0.8"
            } 
            "06"
            {
                "var_type"                  "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "bonus_damage_per_stack"    "0.32 0.48 0.64 0.8"
            }
            "07"
            {
                "var_type"                  "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "global_radius"             "100000"
            }
        } 

        "Modifiers"
        {
            "modifier_thirst_datadriven"
            {
                "IsHidden"  "1"
                "Passive"   "1"
                    
                "ThinkInterval"  "0.5"
                "OnIntervalThink"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {                             
                        "ScriptFile"        "abilities/bloodseeker_thirst.lua"
                        "Function"          "CheckThirst"
                    }
                }
            }
                
            "modifier_thirst_buff"
            {
                "IsHidden"  "1"
                
                "Properties"
                {
                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEATTACK_BONUSDAMAGE"  "%bonus_damage_per_stack"
                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%bonus_movement_speed_per_stack"
                }
            }
	    
            "modifier_thirst_visual"
            {
                "Passive"   "1"
            }
	    
            "modifier_thirst_haste"
            {
                "IsHidden"  "1"
                "EffectName" "particles/units/heroes/hero_bloodseeker/bloodseeker_thirst_owner.vpcf"
                "EffectAttachType" "follow_origin"
            }

            "modifier_thirst_debuff_datadriven"
            {
                "IsDebuff"        "1"                          
                    
                "EffectName" "particles/units/heroes/hero_bloodseeker/bloodseeker_vision.vpcf"
                "EffectAttachType" "follow_origin"
                    
                "States"
                {
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_INVISIBLE"  "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_DISABLED"
                }
                
                "Properties"
                {
                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PROVIDES_FOW_POSITION" "1"
                }
            }
        }
    }

        {
            "ApplyModifier"
            {

            "soundfile"         "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_mirana.vsndevts"
            "particle"          "particles/units/heroes/hero_mirana/mirana_starfall_attack.vpcf"
            "particle"          "particles/units/heroes/hero_mirana/mirana_starfall_circle.vpcf"
        }
        
        // Casting
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityCastPoint"              "0.5 0.5 0.5 0.5"

        // Time     
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityCooldown"               "12.0 12.0 12.0 12.0"
        "AbilityDuration"               "10.0 10.0 10.0 10.0"

        // Damage.
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityDamage"                 "75 150 225 300"

        // Cost
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityManaCost"               "100 120 140 160"

        // Cast animation
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityCastAnimation"          "ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_1"

        // Special
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilitySpecial"
        {
            "01"
            {
                "var_type"          "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "starfall_radius"   "625"       
            }
            "02"
            {
                "var_type"          "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "starfall_secondary_radius" "175"
            }
            "03"
            {
                "var_type"          "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "starfall_delay"    "0.57"
            }
            "04"
            {
                "var_type"          "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "starfall_secondary_damage_pct" "0.75"
            }
            "05"
            {
                "var_type"          "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "starfall_secondary_targets"    "1"
            }
            "06"
            {
                "var_type"          "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "scepter_interval"  "8.0"
            }
        }

        "OnSpellStart"
        {
            "FireSound"
            {
                "EffectName"    "Ability.Starfall"
                "Target"        "CASTER"
            }

            "FireEffect"
            {
                "EffectName"    "particles/units/heroes/hero_mirana/mirana_starfall_circle.vpcf"
                "EffectAttachType"  "attach_origin"
                "Target"        "CASTER"
            }

            "ActOnTargets"
            {
                "Target"
                {
                    "Center" "CASTER"
                    "Radius" "%starfall_radius"
                    "Teams" "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY" 
                    "Types" "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
                }

                "Action"
                {
                    "FireEffect"
                    {
                        "EffectName"    "particles/units/heroes/hero_mirana/mirana_starfall_attack.vpcf"
                        "EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
                        "Target"        "TARGET"
                    }

                    "DelayedAction"
                    {
                        "Delay"     "%starfall_delay"

                        "Action"
                        {

                            "FireSound"
                            {
                                "EffectName"    "Ability.StarfallImpact"
                                "Target"        "TARGET"
                            }

                            "Damage"
                            {
                                "Target"    "TARGET"
                                "Type"      "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
                                "Damage"    "%AbilityDamage"
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

            // Secondary starfall
            "ActOnTargets"
            {
                "Target"
                {
                    "Center" "CASTER"
                    "Radius" "%starfall_secondary_radius"
                    "Teams" "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY" 
                    "Types" "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
                    "MaxTargets"    "%starfall_secondary_targets"
                    "Random"        "1"
                }

                "Action"
                {
                    "DelayedAction"
                    {
                        "Delay" "%starfall_delay"

                        "Action"
                        {
                            "FireEffect"
                            {
                                "EffectName"    "particles/units/heroes/hero_mirana/mirana_starfall_attack.vpcf"
                                "EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
                                "Target"        "TARGET"
                            }

                            "DelayedAction"
                            {
                                "Delay"     "%starfall_delay"

                                "Action"
                                {

                                    "FireSound"
                                    {
                                        "EffectName"    "Ability.StarfallImpact"
                                        "Target"        "TARGET"
                                    }

                                    "Damage"
                                    {
                                        "Target"    "TARGET"
                                        "Type"      "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
                                        "Damage"    "%AbilityDamage * %starfall_secondary_damage_pct"
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        "Modifiers"
        {
            "modifier_mirana_starfall_scepter_cooldown"
            {
                "Duration"        "%scepter_interval"

                "IsHidden"            "1"
                "IsDebuff"            "0"

                "OnDestroy"
                {
                    "ApplyModifier"
                    {
                        "ModifierName"    "modifier_mirana_starfall_scepter_thinker"
                        "Target"         "CASTER"
                    }
                }
            }

            "modifier_mirana_starfall_scepter_thinker"
            {
                "Passive"            "1"
                "IsHidden"            "1"
                "IsDebuff"            "0"
        
                "ThinkInterval"  "1.0"
                "OnIntervalThink"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "abilities/mirana_starfall_lod.lua"
                        "Function"      "ScepterStarfallCheck"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    //=================================================================================================================
    // LoD essence aura - based on https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Pizzalol/SpellLibrary
    //=================================================================================================================
    "obsidian_destroyer_essence_aura_lod"
    {
        // General
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "BaseClass"             "ability_datadriven"
        "AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AURA"
        "AbilityUnitTargetTeam"         "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_FRIENDLY"
        "AbilityUnitTargetType"         "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
        "AbilityTextureName"            "obsidian_destroyer_essence_aura"

            // Precache
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "precache"
        {
            "particle"      "particles/units/heroes/hero_obsidian_destroyer/obsidian_destroyer_essence_effect.vpcf"
        }

        // Special
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilitySpecial"
        {
            "01"
            {
                "var_type"          "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "radius"            "900 900 900 900"
            }
            "02"
            {
                "var_type"          "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "bonus_mana"        "75 150 225 300"
            }
            "03"
            {
                "var_type"          "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "restore_amount"    "10 15 20 25"
            }
            "04"
            {
                "var_type"          "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "restore_chance"        "40"
            }
        }

        "Modifiers"
        {
            //Static bonus mana which applies to od only

            "modifier_essence_aura_mana_bonus_lod"
            {
                "Passive"   "1"
                "IsPurgable"    "0"
                "IsHidden"  "1"
                "Aura" "modifier_essence_aura_effect_lod" // this should be the actual mana restore on proc
                "Aura_Radius" "%radius"
                "Aura_Teams" "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_FRIENDLY"
                "Aura_Types" "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
                "Aura_ApplyToCaster" "1"

                "Properties"
                {
                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_BONUS"  "%bonus_mana"
                }
            }

            "modifier_essence_aura_effect_lod"
            {

                "OnAbilityExecuted"
                {
                    "Random"
                    {
                        "Chance"    "%restore_chance"

                        "OnSuccess"
                        {
                            "RunScript"
                            {
                                "ScriptFile"    "abilities/obsidian_destroyer_essence_aura_lod.lua"
                                "Function"      "RestoreMana"
                                "Target"        "UNIT"
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    {
        // General
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

        "AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"

            // Precache

        {
            "particle"      "particles/units/heroes/hero_earthshaker/earthshaker_aftershock.vpcf"
        }

        // Time
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityDuration"               "0.6 0.9 1.2 1.5"
        "AbilityCooldown"               "5.0"

        // Damage.
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityDamage"                 "50 75 100 125"

        // Stats
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityModifierSupportBonus"   "100"

        // Special
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilitySpecial"
        {
            "01"
            {
                "var_type"                  "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "aftershock_range"          "300"
            }
            "02"
            {
                "var_type"                  "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "tooltip_duration"          "0.6 0.9 1.2 1.5"
            }
        }

        "Modifiers"
        {
            //Static bonus mana which applies to od only

            "modifier_aftershock_lod"
            {
                "Passive"   "1"
                "IsPurgable"    "0"
                "IsHidden"  "1"

                "OnAbilityExecuted"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "abilities/earthshaker_aftershock_lod.lua"
                        "Function"      "TryAftershock"
                        "Target"        "UNIT"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    "slark_essence_shift_strength_lod"
    {
        // General
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "BaseClass"                     "ability_datadriven"
        "AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
        "SpellImmunityType"             "SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
        "AbilityTextureName"            "custom/slark_essence_shift_strength_lod"
        // Special
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilitySpecial"
        {
            "01"
            {
                "var_type"              "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "ranged_chance"          "65"
            }
            "02"
            {
                "var_type"              "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "str_gain"              "3"
            }
            "03"
            {
                "var_type"              "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "stat_loss"             "-1"
            }
            "04"
            {
                "var_type"              "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "duration"              "15 30 60 120"
            }
        }


        "Modifiers"
        {
            "modifier_slark_essence_shift_strength_datadriven"  //This modifier is always on Slark and simply triggers a script when an autoattack lands on an enemy.
            {
                "Passive"   "1"
                "IsHidden"  "1"

                "OnAttackLanded"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"                "abilities/slark_essence_shift_strength_lod.lua"
                        "Function"                  "modifier_slark_essence_shift_strength_datadriven_on_attack_landed"
                        "StatLoss"                  "%stat_loss"
                    }
                }
            }
            "modifier_slark_essence_shift_strength_datadriven_buff_counter"  //A visible counter that will appear in Slark's modifier bar.
            {
                "Duration"          "%duration"
                "Passive"           "0"
                "IsHidden"          "0"

                "Properties"
                {
                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_STRENGTH_BONUS"     "%str_gain"
                }
            }
            "modifier_slark_essence_shift_strength_datadriven_debuff_counter"  //A visible counter that will appear in Slark's target's modifier bar.
            {
                "Duration"          "%duration"
                "Passive"           "0"
                "IsHidden"          "0"
                "IsBuff"            "0"
                "IsDebuff"          "1"
                "IsPurgable"        "0"

                "Properties"
                {
                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_STRENGTH_BONUS"        "%stat_loss"
                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_AGILITY_BONUS"         "%stat_loss"
                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_INTELLECT_BONUS"       "%stat_loss"
                }
            }
            "modifier_slark_essence_shift_strength_datadriven_buff"
            {
                "Duration"              "%duration"
                "Passive"               "0"
                "IsHidden"              "1"
                "Attributes"            "MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"

                "OnDestroy"  //Decrement the visible counter.
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"                "abilities/slark_essence_shift_strength_lod.lua"
                        "Function"                  "modifier_slark_essence_shift_strength_datadriven_buff_on_destroy"
                    }
                }
            }
            "modifier_slark_essence_shift_strength_datadriven_debuff"
            {
                "Duration"              "%duration"
                "Passive"               "0"
                "IsHidden"              "1"
                "Attributes"            "MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"

                "OnDestroy"  //Decrement the visible counter.
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"                "abilities/slark_essence_shift_strength_lod.lua"
                        "Function"                  "modifier_slark_essence_shift_strength_datadriven_debuff_on_destroy"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    //=================================================================================================================
    // LoD Rearm
    //=================================================================================================================
    "tinker_rearm_lod"
    {
        // General
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "BaseClass"                "ability_datadriven"
        "AbilityBehavior"                "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED"
        "AbilityType"                    "DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
        "AbilityTextureName"            "custom/tinker_rearm_lod"
        "AbilityCastAnimation"            "ACT_DOTA_CHANNEL_ABILITY_4"
    
        // Casting
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityCastPoint"                "0.53 0.53 0.53 0.53"
        "AbilityChannelTime"            "3.0 1.5 0.75"
    
        // Time        
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityCooldown"                "60.0 30.0 15.0"
    
        // Cost
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityManaCost"                "100 200 300"
        
        // Special
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilitySpecial"
        {
            "01"
            {
                "var_type"                "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "channel_tooltip"            "3.0 1.5 0.75"
            }
        }
        
        // Data Driven
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "precache"
        {
            "soundfile"                "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_tinker.vsndevts"
            "particle"                "particles/units/heroes/hero_tinker/tinker_rearm.vpcf"
        }
        
        "OnAbilityPhaseStart"
        {
            "FireSound"
            {
                "Target"            "CASTER"
                "EffectName"        "Hero_Tinker.RearmStart"
            }
        }
        
        "OnSpellStart"
        {
            "FireSound"
            {
                "Target"            "CASTER"
                "EffectName"        "Hero_Tinker.Rearm"
            }
        
            "RunScript"
            {
                "ScriptFile"        "abilities/tinker_rearm_lod.lua"
                "Function"            "rearm_start"
            }
        }
        
        "OnChannelInterrupted"
        {
            "RemoveModifier"
            {
                "Target"            "CASTER"
                "ModifierName"        "modifier_rearm_level_1_datadriven"
            }
        
            "RemoveModifier"
            {
                "Target"            "CASTER"
                "ModifierName"        "modifier_rearm_level_2_datadriven"
            }
        
            "RemoveModifier"
            {
                "Target"            "CASTER"
                "ModifierName"        "modifier_rearm_level_3_datadriven"
            }
        }
        
        "OnChannelSucceeded"
        {
            "RunScript"
            {
                "ScriptFile"        "abilities/tinker_rearm_lod.lua"
                "Function"            "rearm_refresh_cooldown"
            }
        }
        
        "Modifiers"
        {
            "modifier_rearm_level_1_datadriven"
            {
                "IsHidden"            "0"
        
                "Duration"            "%channel_tooltip"
        
                "EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_tinker/tinker_rearm.vpcf"
                "EffectAttachType"    "follow_origin"

                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT"        "%ms_boost"
                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP"                         "%radius"
                }
            }
            "truesight_aura_debuff"
            {
                "IsDebuff"        "1"
                "IsPurgable"    "0"
                "Priority"          "MODIFIER_PRIORITY_HIGH"
                "States"
                {
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_INVISIBLE"  "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_DISABLED"
                }
            }
        }
    }

            "modifier_fury_swipes_caster_lod"
            {
                "Passive"                       "1"
                "IsHidden"                      "1"
                "IsPurgable"                    "0"

                "OnAttackStart"
                // "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value after mitigation
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"            "abilities/ursa_fury_swipes_lod.lua"
                        "Function"              "fury_swipes_check_stacks"
                    }
                }
                "OnAttackLanded"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"            "abilities/ursa_fury_swipes_lod.lua"
                        "Function"              "fury_swipes_attack"
                    }
                }
            }
            
            "modifier_fury_swipes_target_lod"
            {
                "IsHidden"                  "0"
                "IsPurgable"                "0"
                "IsDebuff"                  "1"

                    {
                        "Target"                "TARGET"

                        "EffectAttachType"      "follow_overhead"
                    }
                }
            }
        }

	// Rewrite of the Drow Ranger Markshmanship
	// Author: kritth
	// Date: January 27, 2016
	// Version: 6.86
	// Type: Datadriven
	//
	"marksmanship_int"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
		"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"custom/marksmanship_int"
		"AbilityCastRange"                "%radius"
	
		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"marksmanship_intellect_bonus"	"40 60 80"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"radius"						"400"
			}
			// Extra variables
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"think_interval"				"0.1"
			}
		}
		
		// Data driven
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"precache"
		{
			"particle"							"particles/units/heroes/hero_drow/drow_marksmanship.vpcf"
			"particle"							"particles/units/heroes/hero_drow/drow_marksmanship_start.vpcf"
		}
		
		"OnUpgrade"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"            "modifier_marksmanship_int_effect_datadriven"
				"Target"                 "CASTER"
			}

			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"            "modifier_marksmanship_int_effect_datadriven"
				"Target"                 "CASTER"
			}
		}
		
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_marksmanship_int_passive_datadriven"
			{
				"Passive"						"1"
				"IsHidden"						"1"
				"IsPurgable"					"0"
			
				"ThinkInterval"					"%think_interval"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"			"abilities/marksmanship_int.lua"
						"Function"				"marksmanship_detection"
					}
				}
				
			}
			
			"modifier_marksmanship_int_effect_datadriven"
			{
				"IsPurgable"					"0"
				
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"FireEffect"
					{
						"Target"				"CASTER"
						"EffectName"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_drow/drow_marksmanship_start.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"		"start_at_customorigin"
						"ControlPointEntities"
						{
							"CASTER"			"attach_attack1"
						}
					}
				
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"Target"				"CASTER"
						"EffectName"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_drow/drow_marksmanship.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"		"follow_origin"
						"ControlPoints"
						{
							"02"				"150 150 150"
						}
					}
				}
				
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_INTELLECT_BONUS"		"%marksmanship_intellect_bonus"
				}
			}
		}
	}

    // Cherub - Sleep Cloud
    //=================================================================================================================
    "cherub_sleep_cloud"
    {
        "BaseClass"                    "ability_datadriven"
        "AbilityBehavior"            "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET"
        "AbilityUnitTargetTeam"        "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
        "AbilityUnitTargetType"        "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
        "AbilityTextureName"        "custom/cherub_sleep_cloud"
    
        "AbilityCastPoint"            "0.3"
        "AbilityCooldown"            "40"
        "AbilityManaCost"            "160"
        "AbilityProcsMagicStick"        "1"
    
        "AbilitySpecial"
        {
    
            "01"
            {
                "var_type"            "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "radius"            "450 550 650 750"
            }
            "02"
            {
                "var_type"            "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "sleep_timer"            "4.0"
            }
            "03"
            {
                "var_type"            "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "duration"            "11 12 13 14"
            }
            "04"
            {
                "var_type"            "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "damage_to_wake"        "125 150 175 200"
            }
        }
        "precache"
        {
            "particle"    "particles/cherub_sleep_cloud.vpcf"
            "particle"    "particles/cherub_sleep_status.vpcf"
            "soundfile"   "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_silencer.vsndevts"
        }
        "OnSpellStart"
        {
            "SpawnUnit"
            {
                "UnitName"        "npc_dummy_unit"
                "Target"         "CASTER"
                "Duration"        "%duration"
                "UnitCount"        "1"
                "UnitLimit"        "0"
                "GrantsGold"    "1"
                "GrantsXP"        "1"
                "SpawnRadius"    "10"
                "OnSpawn"
                {
                    "ApplyModifier"
                    {
                        "ModifierName"    "modifier_sleep_cloud_look"
                        "Target"        "TARGET"
                    }
                    "CreateThinker"
                    {
                        "ModifierName"    "modifier_sleep_cloud_thinker"
                        "Target"         "TARGET"
                        "Duration"        "%duration"
                    }
                }
            }
            "FireSound"
            {
                "EffectName"    "Hero_Silencer.Curse"
                "Target"         "CASTER"
            }
        }
        "Modifiers"
        {
            "modifier_sleep_cloud_look"
            {
                "IsPurgeable"            "0"
                "Duration"            "%duration"
                "States"
                {
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_UNSELECTABLE"         "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_NO_UNIT_COLLISION"    "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_NOT_ON_MINIMAP"       "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_PROVIDES_VISION"      "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_DISABLED"
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_ROOTED"               "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_DISARMED"             "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_INVULNERABLE"         "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_LOW_ATTACK_PRIORITY"  "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_NO_HEALTH_BAR"        "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_OUT_OF_GAME"          "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                }
                "OnCreated"
                {
                    "AttachEffect"
                    {
                        "EffectName"    "particles/cherub_sleep_cloud.vpcf"
                        "EffectAttachType"    "follow_origin"
                        "Target"        "TARGET"
    
                        "ControlPoints"
                        {
                            "01"            "%radius %radius %radius"
                        }
                    }
                    "AttachEffect"
                    {
                        "EffectName"    "particles/cherub_sleep_cloud.vpcf"
                        "EffectAttachType"    "follow_origin"
                        "Target"        "TARGET"
    
                        "ControlPoints"
                        {
                            "01"            "%radius %radius %radius"
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            "modifier_sleep_cloud_thinker"
            {
                "IsPurgeable"            "0"
                "Aura"                "modifier_sleep_cloud_aura"
                "Aura_Radius"            "%radius"
                "Aura_Teams"            "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
                "Aura_Types"            "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_CREEP"
                "Aura_Flags"            "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
                "Duration"                "%duration"
            }
            "modifier_sleep_cloud_aura"
            {
                "Passive"    "0"
                "IsHidden"    "0"

                "OnIntervalThink"
                {
                    "ApplyModifier"
                    {
                        "ModifierName"    "modifier_sleep_cloud_effect"

                    }
                }

            "modifier_sleep_cloud_effect"
            {
                "IsHidden"    "0"
                "IsDebuff"    "1"
    
                "EffectName"    "particles/cherub_sleep_status.vpcf"
                "EffectAttachType"    "follow_overhead"
                "OverrideAnimation"    "ACT_DOTA_DISABLED"
    
                "States"
                {
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_STUNNED"    "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                }
                "ThinkInterval"  "1.0"
                "OnIntervalThink"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "abilities/cherub_sleep_cloud.lua"
                        "Function"        "SleepAuraCheck"
                    }
                }
                "OnDestroy"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "abilities/cherub_sleep_cloud.lua"
                        "Function"    "SleepDamageRemove"
                    }
                }
                "OnTakeDamage"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "abilities/cherub_sleep_cloud.lua"
                        "Function"        "SleepDamageCheck"
                        "DamageTaken"    "%attack_damage"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
    //=================================================================================================================
    // Cherub - Synthesis
    //=================================================================================================================
    "cherub_synthesis"
    {
        "BaseClass"                "ability_datadriven"
        "AbilityBehavior"            "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_TOGGLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_PSEUDO_QUEUE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL"
        "AbilityTextureName"            "custom/cherub_synthesis"
    
        "AbilitySpecial"
        {
            "01"
            {
                "var_type"            "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "base_conversion_rate"        "10 20 30 40"
            }
            "02"
            {
                "var_type"            "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "health_to_mana"        "80 100 120 140"
            }
            "03"
            {
                "var_type"            "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "mana_to_health"        "125 150 175 200"
            }
            "04"
            {

    "garden_teleport"
    {
        // General
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "BaseClass"             "ability_datadriven"
        "AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NORMAL_WHEN_STOLEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE"
        "AbilityTextureName"        "custom/garden_teleport"

        // Stats
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "MaxLevel"                      "1"
        "AbilityCastRange"              "0"
        "AbilityCastPoint"              "3"
        "AbilityCooldown"               "20"
        "AbilityManaCost"               "0"

        "precache"
        {
            "particle"  "particles/units/heroes/hero_furion/furion_teleport_end.vpcf"
            "particle"  "particles/units/heroes/hero_furion/furion_teleport_end_team.vpcf"
            "particle"  "particles/units/heroes/hero_furion/furion_teleport.vpcf"
            "particle"  "particles/units/heroes/hero_furion/furion_teleport_e.vpcf" //Endcap if canceled
            "soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_furion.vsndevts"
        }
        "AbilitySpecial"
        {
            "01"
            {
                "var_type"            "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "range"            "1500"
            }
        }

        "OnAbilityPhaseStart"
        {
            "ApplyModifier"
            {
                "ModifierName"  "modifier_teleportation"
                "Target"        "CASTER"
                "Duration"      "3"
            }

            "FireSound"
            {
                "EffectName"    "Hero_Furion.Teleport_Grow"
                "Target"        "CASTER"
            }

            "RunScript"
            {
                "ScriptFile"    "abilities/garden_teleport.lua"
                "Function"      "CreateTeleportParticles"
                "Target"        "POINT"
            }
        }

        "OnSpellStart"
        {
            "FireSound"
            {
                "EffectName"    "Hero_Furion.Teleport_Disappear"
                "Target"        "CASTER"
            }
            "RunScript"
            {
                "ScriptFile"    "abilities/garden_teleport.lua"
                "Function"      "Teleport"
                "Target"        "POINT"
            }
            "FireSound"
            {
                "EffectName"    "Hero_Furion.Teleport_Appear"
                "Target"        "CASTER"
            }
            "FireSound"
            {
                "EffectName"    "Hero_Enchantress.EnchantCast"
                "Target"        "CASTER"
            }
        }

        "Modifiers"
        {
            "modifier_teleportation"
            {
                "IsHidden"          "0"
        
                "EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_furion/furion_teleport.vpcf"
                "EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"

                "OnOrder"
                {
                    "FireSound"
                    {
                        "EffectName"    "Hero_Furion.Teleport_Disappear"
                        "Target"        "CASTER"
                    }

                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "abilities/garden_teleport.lua"
                        "Function"      "EndTeleport"
                    }

                    "RemoveModifier"
                    {
                        "ModifierName"  "modifier_teleportation"
                        "Target"        "CASTER"
                    }
                }
            }
        }

    // Omniknight's Degen Aura
    //=================================================================================================================
    "imba_omniknight_degen_aura"
    {
        // General
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "BaseClass"                        "ability_datadriven"
        "AbilityBehavior"                "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AURA"
        "AbilityUnitTargetTeam"            "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
        "SpellImmunityType"                "SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
        "AbilityTextureName"            "custom/imba_omniknight_degen_aura"
        
        // Casting
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityCastRange"                "400 500 600 700"
        
        // Special
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilitySpecial"
        {
            "01"
            {
                "var_type"                "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "radius"                "400 500 600 700"
            }
            "02"
            {
                "var_type"                "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "stack_rate"            "1.0"
            }
            "03"
            {
                "var_type"                "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "sticky_time"            "1.1"
            }
            "04"
            {
                "var_type"                "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "stack_reduction_pct"    "3 4 5 6"
            }
        }

        "precache"
        {
            "soundfile"                    "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_omniknight.vsndevts"
            "particle"                    "particles/units/heroes/hero_omniknight/omniknight_degen_aura_debuff.vpcf"
        }

        "OnUpgrade"
        {
            "RemoveModifier"
            {
                "ModifierName"            "modifier_imba_degen_aura"
                "Target"                 "CASTER"
            }

            "ApplyModifier"
            {
                "ModifierName"            "modifier_imba_degen_aura"
                "Target"                 "CASTER"
            }
        }

        "Modifiers"
        {
            "modifier_imba_degen_aura"
            {
                "Passive"                 "1"
                "IsHidden"                 "1"
                "IsBuff"                "1"
                "IsPurgable"            "0"

                "Aura"                     "modifier_imba_degen_aura_effect"
                "Aura_Radius"             "%radius"
                "Aura_Teams"             "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
                "Aura_Types"             "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
                "Aura_Flags"               "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NONE"

                "OnCreated"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "lib/util_imba.lua" 
                        "Function"                        "IllusionPassiveRemover"

                        "modifier"                        "modifier_imba_degen_aura"
                    }
                }
            }

            "modifier_imba_degen_aura_effect"
            {
                "IsDebuff"                "1"
                "IsPurgable"            "1"
                "IsHidden"                "1"

                "EffectName"            "particles/units/heroes/hero_omniknight/omniknight_degen_aura_debuff.vpcf"
                "EffectAttachType"        "follow_origin"

                "Duration"                "%sticky_time"

                "ThinkInterval"          "%stack_rate"
                
                "OnIntervalThink"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"        "abilities/hero_omniknight.lua"
                        "Function"            "DegenAura"

                        "modifier_stacks"    "modifier_imba_degen_aura_stacks"
                    }
                }
            }

            "modifier_imba_degen_aura_stacks"
            {
                "IsDebuff"                "1"
                "IsHidden"                "0"
                "IsPurgable"            "1"

                "Duration"                "%sticky_time"

                "Properties"
                {
                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE"    "-1"
                }
            }
        }
    }

                        "modifier_cooldown"                    "modifier_imba_shallow_grave_passive_cooldown"

                        "ScriptFile"                    "lib/util_imba.lua" 
                        "Function"                        "IllusionPassiveRemover"

                        "modifier"                        "modifier_imba_shallow_grave_passive_check"
                    }
                }

    //=================================================================================================================
    // Doom Devour
    //=================================================================================================================
   
    "doom_bringer_devour_lod"
    {
        "BaseClass"                     "ability_datadriven"
        "AbilityTextureName"            "doom_bringer_devour"
        "MaxLevel"                      "4"
        "AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK"
        "AbilityUnitTargetTeam"         "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
        "AbilityUnitTargetType"         "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_CREEP"
        "AbilityUnitTargetFlags"        "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NOT_CREEP_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NOT_ANCIENTS"

        "AbilityCooldown"               "70 60 50 40"
        "AbilityManaCost"               "60"
        "AbilityCastRange"              "300"
        "AbilityCastPoint"              "0.3"

        "precache"
        {
            "soundfile"         "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_doombringer.vsndevts"
            "particle"          "particles/units/heroes/hero_doom_bringer/doom_bringer_devour.vpcf"
        }

        "AbilitySpecial"
        {
            "01"
            {
                "var_type"          "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "devour_gold"       "25 50 75 100"
            }
        }

        "OnAbilityPhaseStart"
        {
            "RunScript"
            {
                "ScriptFile"    "abilities/hero_doom.lua"
                "Function"      "DevourCheck"
                "modifier"      "modifier_creep_eaten"
            }
        }

        "OnSpellStart"
        {
            "FireSound"
            {
                "EffectName"    "Hero_DoomBringer.DevourCast"
                "Target"        "TARGET"
            }

            "FireEffect"
            {
                "EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_doom_bringer/doom_bringer_devour.vpcf"
                "EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
                
                "ControlPointEntities"
                {
                    "TARGET"    "attach_origin"
                    "CASTER"    "attach_origin"
                }
            }
            "RunScript"
            {
                "ScriptFile"    "abilities/hero_doom.lua"
                "Function"      "EatCreep"
            }
        }
        "Modifiers"
        {
            "modifier_creep_eaten"
            {
                "IsDebuff"          "1"
                
                "OnDestroy"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "abilities/hero_doom.lua"
                        "Function"      "CreepGold"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

        "AbilityDuration"       "25.0 25.0 25.0 25.0"

        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

        {

        {
            "01"

            }
            "02"
            {
                "var_type"          "FIELD_INTEGER"
                "radius"  "500"
            }
        }
        
        "OnSpellStart"
        {
            "SpawnUnit"
            {
                "UnitName"        "npc_dota_juggernaut_healing_ward"
                "Target"         "POINT"
                "Duration"        "%AbilityDuration"
                "UnitCount"        "1"
                "UnitLimit"        "0"
                "GrantsGold"    "1"
                "GrantsXP"        "1"
                "SpawnRadius"    "1"
                "OnSpawn"
                {
                    "ApplyModifier"
                    {
                        "ModifierName"    "modifier_phased"
                        "Target"        "TARGET"
                        "Duration"        "0.03"
                    }
                    "ApplyModifier"
                    {
                        "ModifierName"    "modifier_healing_ward_mana_aura"
                        "Target"         "TARGET"
                        "Duration"      "%AbilityDuration"
                    }
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"  "abilities/juggernaut_healing_ward_mana.lua"
                        "Function"    "onHealingWardSpawn"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        "Modifiers"
        {
            "modifier_healing_ward_mana_aura"
            {
                "Passive"      "0"
                "IsHidden"      "0"
                "IsDebuff"      "0"
            
                "Aura"            "modifier_healing_ward_mana_aura_effect"
                "Aura_Radius"     "%radius"
                "Aura_Teams"      "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_FRIENDLY"
                "Aura_Types"      "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
                "Aura_Flags"      "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NONE"
                "Aura_ApplyToCaster" "1"

                {
                  "MODIFIER_STATE_NO_UNIT_COLLISION"    "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                  "MODIFIER_STATE_MAGIC_IMMUNE"         "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                }
            }
            "modifier_healing_ward_mana_aura_effect"
            {
                "Passive"      "0"
                "IsHidden"      "0"
                "IsDebuff"      "0"

		}

			"01"

				"radius"				"800"
			}

				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"locusts"				"9 12 15 18"
			}
			"03"

				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"

			}

				"locusts_speed"			"400"
			}
			"05"

				"max_distance"			"2000"	//teleports
			}
			"06"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"give_up_distance"		"900" //Max distance to follow a target acquired
			}
			"07"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"delay_between_locusts"	"0.2"	//Means 4 seconds to spawn all 20 locusts
			}
			"08"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"locust_damage"			"6"	//Physical damage instance on each collision
			}
			"09"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"locust_heal_threshold"	"1000"	//The amount of physical damage that needs to be done to return and heal the caster
			}
			"10"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"max_locusts_on_target"	"7"	//Max counter of units locked onto one target, find another or idle if this threshold is met
			}
		}
	
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_locust_swarm"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
			}
	
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_locust_swarm"
				"Target"
				{
					"Center"  	"CASTER"
					"Flags"     "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_INVULNERABLE"
				}
				"Duration"		"%duration"
			}
	
			"FireSound"
			{

				"Target" 		"CASTER"
			}
		}

			"modifier_locust_swarm"

					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"abilities/life_in_arena/BallLightning.lua"

					}
				}
	
				"OnDeath"

					"FireSound"
					{

					}

					}
				}
			}

							"TARGET"	"attach_origin"

						}
					}
				}

					}

				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"

			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"cast_point"			".75"  //Change AbilityCastPoint if this is.
			}
			"04"
			{

				"pip_current"			"1"
			}

		}
		
		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"radius"				"500" 
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"fade_time"				"4 3 2 1"
			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"pip_current"			"1"
			}
		}
		
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_invoker_retro_invisibility_aura"
			{
				"Passive"  			"1"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
		
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.03"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"abilities/retro_dota/invoker_retro_invisibility_aura.lua"
						"Function"		"modifier_invoker_retro_invisibility_aura_on_interval_think"
						"FadeTime"		"%fade_time"
					}
				}
				
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"abilities/retro_dota/invoker_retro_invisibility_aura.lua"
						"Function"		"modifier_invoker_retro_invisibility_aura_on_created"
					}
				}
				
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"abilities/retro_dota/invoker_retro_invisibility_aura.lua"
						"Function"		"modifier_invoker_retro_invisibility_aura_on_destroy"
					}
				}
								
			}
			
			//A modifier this is applied to units while they are within the radius of a friendly Invoker's Invisibility Aura.
			"modifier_invoker_retro_invisibility_aura_in_radius"
			{
				"Duration"			".5"
				"Passive"  			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				
				"OnAbilityExecuted"  //Remove the invisibility modifier from this unit (if applicable).
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"abilities/retro_dota/invoker_retro_invisibility_aura.lua"
						"Function"		"modifier_invoker_retro_invisibility_aura_in_radius_on_ability_executed"
					}
				}
				
				//Note: For parity, the invisibility should be removed when the autoattack projectile appears, 
				//but there is currently no event that can be used for this.
				"OnAttackStart" 
				{				
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"abilities/retro_dota/invoker_retro_invisibility_aura.lua"
						"Function"		"modifier_invoker_retro_invisibility_aura_in_radius_on_attack_start"
					}
				}
			}
			
			"modifier_invoker_retro_invisibility_aura_effect"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsBuff"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"IsPurgable"		"0"
				"Duration"			".5"
				"Attributes"		"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_IGNORE_INVULNERABLE"
				"TextureName"		"invoker_retro_invisibility_aura"
	
				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_INVISIBLE"					"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
				
				"ThinkInterval" 		".03"
				//Repeatedly apply the stock modifier_invisible for the sole purpose of making the unit have a transparent texture.
				//This can be gotten rid of when we discover how to apply a translucent texture manually.
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"abilities/retro_dota/invoker_retro_invisibility_aura.lua"
						"Function"		"modifier_invoker_retro_invisibility_aura_effect_on_interval_think"
					}
				}				
			}
		}
	}
